Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget

This packages contains the widgets/ Views which are components of a user interface and user recognizable.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AbsListView.OnScrollListener Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the list or grid has been scrolled.
AbsListView.RecyclerListener A RecyclerListener is used to receive a notification whenever a View is placed inside the RecycleBin's scrap heap.
AbsListView.SelectionBoundsAdjuster The top-level view of a list item can implement this interface to allow itself to modify the bounds of the selection shown for that item.
AdapterView.OnItemClickListener Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this AdapterView has been clicked.
AdapterView.OnItemLongClickListener Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this view has been clicked and held.
AdapterView.OnItemSelectedListener Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this view has been selected.
HeterogeneousExpandableList Additional methods that when implemented make an ExpandableListAdapter take advantage of the Adapter view type mechanism.
WPJumpView.OnLetterSelectListener Listener to be notified when a letter has been selected.
WPMenuView.OnExpandListener Listener to be notified when the menu expands or collapses.
WPPanorama.OnScreenChangeListener Listener for when a screen is changing, and when a screen has changed.
WPPanorama.OnScrollListener Listener for when the user is scrolling.
WPPivotControl.OnScrollListener Listener for when the user is scrolling.
WPPivotControl.OnTabChangeListener Implement this interface to handle tab changes.
WPPivotHeader.OnHeaderClickListener Interface that links this WPPivotHeader with its parent WPPivotControl.
WPSlidingImageView.SlideListener Use this listener interface to catch slide events.
WPSlidingImageView.SlidingImageAdapter Have your WPSlidingImageView.SlidingImageAdapter implement this interface and override the getBitmap method, which will be used by this gallery to display images.
WPThemeView.OnAccentSelectedListener Simple interface that is notified when the user has selected a different accent color.
WPToast.OnToastVisibilityChanged Listener to be notified when the visibility of a WPToast has changed.
WPToast.WPToastView.OnAttachListener Listener to be notified when this view's onDetachedFromWindow has been called.
WPToggleSwitch.OnToggleChangedListener Interface that notifies when the state of the toggle switch has changed.
 

Class Summary
AbsListView Base class that can be used to implement virtualized lists of items.
AbsListView.LayoutParams AbsListView extends LayoutParams to provide a place to hold the view type.
AdapterView<T extends Adapter> An AdapterView is a view whose children are determined by an Adapter.
AdapterView.AdapterContextMenuInfo Extra menu information provided to the android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener#onCreateContextMenu(ContextMenu, View, ContextMenuInfo) callback when a context menu is brought up for this AdapterView.
ArrayUtils ArrayUtils contains some methods that you can call to find out the most efficient increments by which to grow arrays.
FrameLayout

Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget Description

This packages contains the widgets/ Views which are components of a user interface and user recognizable. Key players in this package are the Pivot (WPPivotControl) and Panoramic (WPPanorama) layouts, which are fundamental to the Metro User Interface. It also contains a number of other widgets that form the details of the UI including check boxes, buttons, and more.

The developer of this library may be contacted at contact@tombarrasso.com.
